category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAllowedChildTypes_Paragraph
preference.preference_description: Defines the item types permitted in a paragraph parent structure. This preference is valid only when the TCEnforceSingleType preference is set to false. Paragraph objects are defined by the Paragraph business object type. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter business object internal name.
